text: Ruslan Khadarkevich (; ; born 18 June 1993) is a Belarusian professional footballer. As of 2019, he plays for Shakhtyor Soligorsk.Player's profile at pressball.by ==References== == External links == * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Bereza-2010 players Category:FC Slavia Mozyr players Category:FC Smolevichi players Category:FC Shakhtyor Soligorsk players
title: Ruslan Khadarkevich
